short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes all posts from users you specify in the settings from the ZwareMetalen forum.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can remove or replace posts by annoying users and make your ZM-experience way more fun!
